column2: [This.GetFirstNameWithNick] is renowned throughout the world for the many great books [This.GetSheHe] wrote on various topics, which proved [This.GetHerHis] vast knowledge and great writing skill.

The writings of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] are recognized as greatest literary works of the Middle Ages. If there was a Swedish academy that granted prizes in various categories, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] would certainly win the prize for literature.
